abstract: Free text messages, the documentary film "Connected," a high-tech toilet and the Pioneer AppRadio are the topics on this week's podcast.
snippet: Free text messages, the documentary film "Connected," a high-tech toilet and the Pioneer AppRadio are the topics on this week's podcast.
lead_paragraph: Text-messaging plans and fees can add quite a bit of revenue to the coffers of the wireless carriers, but newer services for sending messages free over Wi-Fi networks may soon take a bite out of those profits. On this week's Bits Tech Talk podcast, Jenna Wortham, a technology reporter at The Times, discusses her recent article about how free text apps like iMessage make cellphone users happy and carriers nervous.
